content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* *archived pdf modified december 11 2006* materials *with 1 ball of bernat cottontots solids 100 g/3 5 oz you can make 2 large blocks or 3 small blocks * *with 1 ball of bernat cottontots ombres 85 g/3 oz you can make 1 large block or 2 small blocks * bernat cottontots solids 100 g /3 5 oz ombres 85 g/3 oz **stripey blocks** 3 colors 1 ball each main color mc 90005 wonder white contrast a 90420 pretty in pink contrast b 90421 strawberry size 3 5 mm u s e or 4 crochet hook stuffing color designs are worked from charts updated version in lily sugar n cream baby s blocks to crochet 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/babys-blocks-graphic-stripey-flower
